message.content:
cs.CR, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.NI

The paper discusses a paradigm of protecting a vulnerable system against persistent and stealthy attacks, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed framework involves decision-making and optimization, which suggests the involvement of game theory (cs.GT) and control systems (cs.SY). The use of algorithms to compute optimal strategies indicates the involvement of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
